title: Object-Oriented Programming (Classes & Objects)
concept: This level focuses on defining classes, attributes, constructors, instance methods, objects, encapsulation of logic, and using objects to solve problems.

challenges.title: Rectangle Area
challenges.description: Create a class Rectangle with attributes width and height and a method area() that returns width * height. Read width and height, create an object and print area.

challenges.title: Student Average
challenges.description: Create class Student with name and 3 marks. Method average() returns integer average. Read input and print average.

challenges.title: Bank Account
challenges.description: Create class Account with holder and balance. Methods deposit(x) and withdraw(y). After performing both, print final balance.

challenges.title: Counter Class
challenges.description: Create class Counter starting with 0. Methods inc() increments, dec() decrements. Read N operations and print final value.

challenges.title: Point Distance
challenges.description: Create class Point with x and y. Method dist() returns distance from origin using sqrt(x^2 + y^2). Print distance.

challenges.title: Book Info
challenges.description: Class Book has title, author, price. Method info() returns: title-by-author-price. Print info().

challenges.title: Employee Hike
challenges.description: Class Employee has name and salary. Method hike(percent) increases salary. Print updated salary.

challenges.title: Circle Area
challenges.description: Class Circle with radius r. Method area() returns 3.14*r*r.

challenges.title: Car Mileage
challenges.description: Class Car has fuel and distance. Method mileage() returns distance/fuel (double).

challenges.description: Class Book with title, pages. Class Library stores list of Book. After adding N books, print total pages.
